name: Everything is Mayo
description:
A short but exciting adventure RPG about fighting back the evil forces of mayo and saving the world. I created this game as a fun project for myself, shouldn't take more than 20 minutes to beat.

Thanks!
NordicAtlas




If you are interested in reaching out or giving feedback outside of Steam.
Tweet me: @NordicAtlas
Email me: everythingismayo@gmail.com
